pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate and Predict the Low Density Lipoprotein Values // A wide variety of ways to calculate (through equations) or predict (using 9 Machine learning methods as well as a stack algorithm combination of them all) the Low Density Lipoprotein values of patients based on the values of three other metrics as Total Cholesterol , Triglyceride and High Density Lipoprotein.
